mean_en: "a medical condition in which a person feels very sad and anxious and often has physical symptoms such as being unable to sleep
sentence: My cat sank into a deep depression since I had a boyfriend.
sentence_trans: 自从我有了男朋友，我的猫就陷入了深深的抑郁之中。
word_etyma: de向下 + press挤压 + ion名词后缀 → 向下挤压 → 沮丧；萧条
